Params: {3: 'The stars start to twinkle in the mysterious universe as if they were breathing.'}
{3: 'The stardust-filled universe parts like a lifting curtain, revealing a gray-haired girl sitting in a corner of this small world.'}
{3: 'She manipulates the virtual screen in her hands, her brows furrowed as she rapidly adjusts the complex coordinates displayed before her.'}
{2: '??', 3: "These coordinates don't seem right... Gotta try a different set.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The scenery on the stellar shard fluctuates between ethereal and solid as it slowly morphs with each coordinate adjustment she makes.'}
{3: "The gray-haired girl's voice shifts from hopeful to dejected as she stares in confusion at the space she has traversed countless times before."}
{3: 'The sparse starlight fails to fill the vast universe as she floats at its center and reaches out to touch the shattered vortexes before her.'}
{3: 'The vortexes give off a dazzling radiance as space-time stretches and expands, with brilliant rivers of light streaming past her in a breathtaking display.'}
{1: 'She sees the scenes from her past.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'She sees the scenes from her past.'}
{1: "Aged light cascades upon her friend's shoulders.", 3: '60'}
{3: "Aged light cascades upon her friend's shoulders."}
{1: 'She sees their first encounter in the desert.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'She sees their first encounter in the desert.'}
{1: 'She also sees hope drifting through the endless cosmos.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'She also sees hope drifting through the endless cosmos.'}
{3: 'She fiddles with the virtual screen, her head drooping in defeat.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "How could this be, though... Is there a hiccup with the new frame's navigation system?", 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Why am I having trouble finding the coordinates that would take me back home... when the simulation process should be working just fine...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Once again, she finds herself lost in this vast universe.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Why is this happening... The anchor points should be fixed in place... but where are they now?'}
{3: 'The sparse starlight fails to fill the vast universe as she stares into the boundless expansion of space in bewilderment.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Why can't Nanami find the path back..."}
{3: 'She lets out a soft sigh, her thoughts tinged with sadness.'}
{3: 'Stellar vortexes spin as time and space interweave into intricate, elusive patterns, flowing like rivers that stretch endlessly into the beyond.'}
{3: 'The girl reaches out again, trying to fish out the right thread from the rivers.'}
{1: 'The machine oil trickles down like tears of blood.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'The machine oil trickles down like tears of blood.'}
{1: 'She sees the mournful cries of her comrades.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'She sees the mournful cries of her comrades.'}
{1: 'She sees a tide she has never experienced before.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'She sees a tide she has never experienced before.'}
{3: "The shining moon and the flames reflect each other's light under the night sky. Following this timeline, she now sees that certain human once again."}
{3: 'The virtual screen dissipates into the universe, having exhausted itself. The girl, however, perks up with renewed vigor.'}
{3: 'The brief simulation ends once more, but within her M.I.N.D., she can see the human commandant every bit as clearly as if they are right next to each other.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Well, still no luck with the coordinates, but I sure never saw that coming...', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I wonder what Commandant is doing now...', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Is the commandant going to come for me upon a cloud of stars like the people do in fairy tales?', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Actually, Commandant already has a bunch of things to deal with. Nanami should keep trying and figure out a way to get back to the commandant.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Don't worry, Commandant! Wait for Nanami! Nanami is coming!", 4: '18'}
{3: 'Suddenly energized, the gray-haired girl clenches her fists and vanishes into the cosmos once more, brimming with determination.'}
{3: '—The stars start to twinkle in the mysterious universe as if they were breathing.'}
